summary: Faustina, the offspring of a black G.I. and a Roman woman who met during the conflict of World War II, must choose between two Italian men who desperately vie for her attention.
cast: Vonetta McGee|Enzo Cerusico|Renzo Montagnani|Franco Acampora|Clara Bindi|Diana De Curtis|Vanni Castellani|Ernesto Colli|Franca Haas|Valentino Macchi|Ottavia Piccolo|Mirella Pamphili|Salvatore Puntillo|Ruggero Rosi|David Sain|Silvio Silvi|Pino Patti
title: Faustina
